tool.name: demo3D01
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D01 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (lysosomes, mitochondria, nucleoli, and endosomes) with sampling method set to render vesicular objects as ellipsoids without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
-----
**Input**
- Seed for Pseudo-Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm
-----
**Output**
- One zip file with six TIFF (.tif) files containing the nuclear, cell shape, lysosomal, mitochondrial, nucleolar, and endosomal channels
-----
